page.title: 16SENIOR CITIZENS VIEWPOINT
page.content: Mrs. McGuire said that there was not a lot of wildlife about Cheddington The children was not as polite and Cheddington is growing very quick . At Cheddington school there was just the a music room when Mrs. McGuire was at school.It was just a room but now she said it is very big and some people had to walk up to the canal bridge and walk back to the school before half past one.The infants in half of the room and the juniors were in the other half .It had a partition Mrs Megire said that the proposed bypass was a very good and it would take a lot of cars away from the village bypass. Mrs. McGuire accused the parents for not for not looking after there children. When children get home from school thay do not go and look for flowers thay go round making truble.
